Name: Caribbean Colada
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple, Luxardo Maraschino Cherry & paper parasol.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Rum and pineapple strike up a tropical harmony, helped by coconut, passionfruit and orange.
History: Adapted from a recipe promoted by Giffard in June 2016 with the launch of their Caribbean Pineapple liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Caribbean Colada contains 266 calories
